backend/main.mo: Defines types and shared state for products, vendors, orders, users, and access control, including admin bootstrap and vendor/admin role checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing UI behavior, styling, and component roles.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documents production build fixes including environment variable corrections and restoration of Vite/TypeScript config files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and defining PWA meta tags and icons.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient styling and retry button for PWA usage.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network‑first or cache‑first strategies with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s TanStack router, defining routes for customer, vendor, and admin pages with role-based protection.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: React error boundary for admin pages that logs crashes and shows a fallback UI with diagnostics and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main layout wrapper with top and bottom navigation around page content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with optional admin actions, backend error details, and refresh/assign admin controls.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session clearing and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to submit basic personal information.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑based access wrapper that checks authentication, actor state, and role queries to allow or deny page access.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a mobile bottom navigation bar that adapts links based on user role and shows cart counts.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Styled wrapper around the base Button component applying a primary CTA gradient style.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Displays a product deal card with pricing, discount, image, and optional deal tag ribbons.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Input component with floating label behavior and styled focus transitions.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Implements an auto-rotating hero banner slider with navigation arrows and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive product grid with loading skeletons, pricing logic, stock badges, and add‑to‑cart actions.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge component that displays order status text with style classes based on status helpers.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Provides the top navigation bar with search, role-based links, cart indicator, and responsive layout.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Static list of vendor metadata including IDs, shop names, locations, and mobile numbers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Lightweight hook that reads actor query status from React Query cache using a subscription without triggering re-renders.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state and creating AuthClient instances.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, and other backend data using the actor and identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and custom utilities for shadows and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details and feature cards highlighting platform benefits.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Fetches and displays analytics data with loading, error, and empty states plus basic metrics and charts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders for admins with status controls and updates handled via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides admin UI to list, create, edit, and delete products using dialogs and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Shows vendor list and allows admins to add or remove vendors via dialog forms.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the shopping cart, handling quantity updates, removal, subtotal calculation, and checkout access control.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows a list of product categories with loading skeletons and navigable category cards using themed visuals.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Renders a product listing for a selected category with sorting options and filtering by active products.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items, calculates totals, and submits an order before clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form with validation and simulated submission along with basic contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Displays the logged‑in customer’s profile and role information in a read‑only form.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Shows the customer’s past orders with status badges and basic order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Renders the customer’s wishlist with product cards, loading skeletons, and availability/discount indicators.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the home layout with hero slider, login buttons, deals section, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Customer login form collecting personal and location details with validation, saving data, and navigating to the vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Vendor outlet details form with image upload, validation, and saving data before navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Displays vendor dashboard showing registration success and outlet info using saved vendor and outlet data.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Lists vendors filtered by selected city and allows navigating to individual vendor shop pages.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Vendor login form capturing personal and location details with validation and navigation to outlet details.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Shows detailed information for a selected vendor, including location and contact, with navigation back to vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info with image carousel, pricing, reviews, and actions to add to cart or submit reviews.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Displays vendor dashboard with product, order, and stats data, including wallet due, sales, outlet status, and payment handling.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Shows a list of vendor orders with status, dates, and totals, including a loading state and empty-state UI.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Manages vendor products with add, edit, and delete functionality, using a modal form and backend mutations.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Maps category IDs to deterministic gradient color classes using a hash-based lookup.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Provides a case-insensitive category lookup by name from a list of categories.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Extracts readable error messages and formats diagnostic text for debugging, including trap and reject parsing.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numeric or bigint amounts into INR currency strings with safety for invalid values.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears customer, vendor, and outlet onboarding data in sessionStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Offers safe conversions and formatting for bigints and numbers, ensuring non-finite values fall back to zero.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Provides class names and labels for order and UI statuses and availability indicators for consistent styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read and persist URL parameters, including hash-based routing support and sessionStorage syncing.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite environment types including optional VITE_II_URL config value.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, breakpoints, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, issues, and feature requests related to admin auth, role management, and route-guard fixes.
